p: All patients demonstrated a decrease in the symptom severity during the period of evaluation. However, group A demonstrated an important decrease of 54.5% from the 1 st to 2 nd evaluation, while groups B and C showed a decrease of 40.3% and 28.9% respectively. Group A (n=16) received prednisolone (1%) plus ciprofloxacin (0.3%) demonstrated a trend in improvement of the symptoms when compared to group C (n=16) that received artificial tears plus ciprofloxacin (0.3%) in third evaluation (p=0.055); however, no statistical difference was observed between A and B or between B and C groups in the 1 st, 2 nd 3 rd, 4 th evaluation and in the last assessment respectively ( Table 2 ).
